title: S3cco
author: S3cco
created_time: May 15, 2023, 09:34:40 AMLast edit: September 05, 2023, 12:56:16 PM by S3cco
content: Tech Summit 23 | 1-3 December 2023 | Lahore, PakistanEvent Website: https://techsummit23.com/Tech Summit 23 is the biggest technology event in Asia, taking place in Lahore (PAKISTAN), It provides an excellent platform for technology enthusiasts, industry experts, and businesses to come together, network, and share their insights and experiences.  Attendees will have the opportunity to learn about cutting-edge technologies, gain new perspectives, and explore new business opportunities. With its perfect blend of technology and culture, Tech Summit 23 promises to be an exceptional experience for all participants.

comments.author: S3cco
comments.created_time: May 26, 2023, 08:05:54 AMLast edit: September 05, 2023, 12:56:28 PM by S3cco
comments.body: Tech Summit 23 provides a premier sponsorship opportunity for businesses seeking to connect with a global audience of technology professionals and enthusiasts. With over 150,000 attendees, 100+ exhibitors, and 600+ national and international speakers, Tech Summit 23 is the world’s biggest tech summit, offering the perfect platform to showcase your brand and products to a diverse and engaged audience. As a sponsor, you will receive a range of exclusive benefits, including VIP access, exhibit space, speaking opportunities, and more. Additionally, you will have the opportunity to network with other technology professionals and experts from around the world and gain exposure through media coverage.More info: https://techsummit23.com/become-a-sponsor/

comments.author: S3cco
comments.body: There is a necessary adjustment to the schedule of TECHSUMMIT23. This adjustment is essential due to security clearance and political considerations concerning our esteemed international guests and the prestigious foreign companies' delegation. Consequently, the event is rescheduled to the following dates: December 1st, 2nd, and 3rd, 2023, which will span from Friday to Sunday.

comments.author: wallet4bitcoin
comments.body: Its fascinating to have Pakistan organise such an ausipicious event. The best way to bring techpreneurs are through events such as this it attracts potential investors.The benefits of conferences are enormous as it gives various benefits to various individuals, depending on the expected outcome and also the opportunities it presents to the attendees. For someone who's looking at solving a problem, the challenges associated with the technology is unveiled and he sees a blind spot that he can comfortably fill with his intellectual property deployed through tech solutions and all, for investors, entreprenuers looking for sponsors just got their search ended at the gold mine.
